name: Secure Hosts File
short_description: Protection by an optimized hosts file. Over 29300 DNS entires against Tracking, Adware, Spyware, Viruses, Popups and Redirecting. For more security and privacy. Points the insecure domains to the localhost that they don't get resolved by DNS Servers
